pageProduct.name: Organic Formulations Coconut Shampoo 500ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Coconut Shampoo designed for Everyday use

Common Uses

Everyday use

Ingredients

Ingredients: Aqua, Guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride, P-Anisic acid, Aloe Vera Juice (Aloe barbadenis)*, Coco glucoside, Organic Jojoba Oil (Simmondsia chinesis)*, Organic Sunflower Oil (Helianthus annuss)*, Organic Wheatgerm oil (Triticum vulgare)*, Parfum (Natural preservative), Tocopherol, Organic Argan Oil (Argania spinosa)*, Organic Sweet Almond Oil (Prunus dulcis)*, Coconut Fragrance Natural (Cocos nucifuera) From Organic Agriculture* 32% Organic of total 99% Natural Origin of total

Directions

Wet hair. Massage shampoo into the scalp in a circular motion. Rinse and repeat if necessary.
